ui.browser.almostEmpty: Nobody else is playing right now :(
ui.editor.header.factions.tooltip: Faction restrictions are not being enforced yet
ui.profile.changeUsername.label: Username
ui.profile.changePassword.label: Password
log.entry.unitCreated: Unit {triggeringUnit} has been created on the board
log.entry.unitMoved.sameRow: Unit {triggeringUnit} has moved to a different position in the same row
log.entry.unitOrderedCard: Unit {triggeringUnit} has been issued an order targeting card {targetCard}
log.entry.unitOrderedRow: Unit {triggeringUnit} has been issued an order targeting row {targetRow}
log.entry.cardBuffCreated.fromRow: Row number {sourceRow} has created buff {triggeringBuff} on {parentCard}
log.entry.rowBuffCreated.fromCard: Card {sourceCard} has created buff {triggeringBuff} on row number {parentRow}
log.entry.rowBuffCreated.fromRow: Row number {sourceRow} has created buff {triggeringBuff} on row number {parentRow}
log.entry.rowBuffCreated.fromUniverse: Buff {triggeringBuff} has been created on row number {parentRow}
log.entry.gameFinished.victory: The game has finished. Group {victoriousGroup} has won.
log.entry.gameFinished.draw: The game has finished in a draw.
ruleset.rulesetChallengeDummy.label: AI: Target Dummy
ruleset.rulesetEpicDummyFight.label: Special: Epic Dummy Fight
ruleset.rulesetBrawlDiscovery.label: Special: Discovery League
ruleset.rulesetCampfire.label: The Camp Module
ruleset.rulesetNessadventure.label: Scenario: The Nessadventure
ruleset.rulesetCatastrophe.label: The Catastrophe
ruleset.rulesetCoopChallengeDummy.label: AI Opponent: Target Dummy
ruleset.rulesetCoopBrawlDiscovery.label: AI Opponent: Discovery Dummy
ruleset.rulesetDev.label: Development Ruleset
card.keyword.deploy.description: Trigger an effect after this unit is played.
card.keyword.gameStart.description: Trigger an effect before the game begins.
card.keyword.roundStart.description: Trigger an effect at the beginning of your round.
card.keyword.turnStart.description: Trigger an effect at the start of your turn.
card.keyword.turnEnd.description: Trigger an effect at the end of your turn.
card.keyword.roundEnd.description: Trigger an effect when you finish your round.
card.keyword.heal.description: Restore X Power, but not higher than max Power.
card.keyword.enrage.description: Trigger an effect after this card takes damage as a unit.
card.keyword.infuse.description: When this card is played, consume X of your Mana, if you have it, and trigger an effect. Otherwise, do nothing.
card.keyword.infuseAll.description: When this card is played, consume all your Mana and trigger an effect.
card.keyword.order.description: While this unit is on the board, choose a target and trigger an effect once a turn.
card.keyword.create.description: Play a new copy of a card.
card.keyword.rescue.description: Return card to hand and take its' place.
card.keyword.consume.description: Destroy the card and add its' Power to this card.
card.keyword.shatter.description: Reduce the maximum number of units on a row by the current round number.
card.keyword.transform.description: Replace a card with another card in-place.
card.keyword.summon.description: Play a card directly to the board, skipping Deploy effects.
card.keyword.discard.description: Move a card into the owner's graveyard.
card.keyword.quick.description: Does not end your turn when played.
card.keyword.exile.description: Remove a card from the game.
card.keyword.spy.description: Played on your opponent's side of the board.
card.keyword.dispel.description: Remove last X debuffs from an ally or buffs from an enemy.
card.keyword.protector.description: Whenever an allied unit behind this takes damage from an enemy, intercept it.
card.keyword.prominent.description: Visible to your opponent while in hand.
card.keyword.apathy.description: Does not contribute Power to the total counter.
card.keyword.nightfall.description: Trigger an effect before this unit is destroyed at the end of the round.
card.keyword.nightwatch.description: Stays on the board after the round end, but doesn't contribute to total Power anymore.
card.keyword.leaderPower.description: When played as spell or destroyed as unit, target card returns to your deck. It is also always revealed.
card.keyword.stun.description: Target card is stunned and is temporarily disabled.
card.keyword.growth.description: Target card gets +1 Power at the start of its turn.
card.keyword.immune.description: Target card is immune to damage and any effects.
card.keyword.burning.description: At the end of the turn, deal 1 Damage to all units.
card.keyword.bloodMoon.description: At the end of the turn, give 3 random Beasts, Birds or Merfolks +1 Power.
card.keyword.healingRain.description: At the end of the turn, Heal 3 on 3 weakest allies.
buff.buffProtector.name: Protector (Service buff)
buff.buffMorningApathy.name: Morning Apathy
buff.buffMorningApathy.description: This card has Apathy after staying up all night.
buff.buffBurning.name: Burning
buff.buffBurning.description: This card takes damage every turn.
buff.buffDecayingArmor.name: Decaying armor
buff.buffDecayingArmor.description: Extra armor that decays over time.
buff.buffImmunity.name: Immunity
buff.buffImmunity.description: This card is immune to damage and any effects.
buff.buffPermanentImmunity.name: Permanent Immunity
buff.buffPermanentImmunity.description: This card is immune to damage and any effects.
buff.buffSparksExtraDamage.name: Extra Spark damage
buff.buffNextSpellDiscountAura.name: Next spell discount aura
buff.buffNextSpellDiscountAura.descripti: Whenever you draw a spell, apply 'Next spell discount' to it.
buff.buffNextSpellDiscount.name: Next spell discount
buff.buffNextSpellDiscount.description: Your next spell costs 1 Mana less.
buff.buffSpellDiscountPerTurn.name: Spell discount per turn
buff.buffSpellDiscountPerTurn.descriptio: This spell gets 1 Mana cheaper at the start of your turn.
buff.buffSpellDiscount.name: Spell discount
buff.buffSpellExtraCost.name: Spell markup
buff.buffStrength.name: Power
buff.buffHiddenStrength.name: Power
buff.buffExtraArmor.name: Armor
buff.buffExtraStartingHandSize.name: Starting hand size
buff.buffExtraStartingHandSize.descripti: Starting hand size is increased by 1.
buff.buffWeakness.name: Weakness
buff.buffStun.name: Stun
buff.buffStun.description: This card is stunned and is temporarily disabled.
buff.buffGrowth.name: Growth
buff.buffGrowth.description: This card gets +1 Power at the start of its turn.
buff.buffTutoredCard.name: Tutored card
buff.buffCreatedCard.name: Created card
buff.buffSappedCard.name: Sapped card
buff.buffLeaderPower.name: Leader Power
buff.buffLeaderPower.description: This card is a leader power.
buff.buffUpgradedStorms.name: Upgraded Storms
buff.buffVelElleronEncouragement.name: An Encouragement
buff.buffVelElleronEncouragement.descrip: This card will receive bonus Power at the start of next turn.
buff.buffNightwatch.name: Nightwatch
buff.buffPermanentNightwatch.name: Permanent Nightwatch
buff.buffNoArmor.name: No Armor
buff.buffNoArmor.description: This unit's Armor has been removed.
buff.buffVoidBrandTribe.name: Brand of the Void
buff.buffCanAttack.name: Can Attack
buff.buffRowBloodMoon.name: Blood Moon
card.leaderVelElleron.name: <if inGame><c=black>*{playerName}*</c></if><ifn inGame>The Battlemage</if>
card.leaderVelElleron.title: <if inGame>The Battlemage</if>
card.leaderVelRaminea.name: <if inGame><c=black>*{playerName}*</c></if><ifn inGame>The Flameweaver</if>
card.leaderVelRaminea.title: <if inGame>The Flameweaver</if>
card.leaderNighterie.name: <if inGame><c=black>*{playerName}*</c></if><ifn inGame>The Keeper of Shadows</if>
card.leaderNighterie.title: <if inGame>The Keeper of Shadows</if>
card.heroZamarath.name: Zamarath
card.heroZamarath.title: The Protector
card.heroKroLah.name: Kro'Lah
card.heroKroLah.title: The Sky Guardian
card.heroKroLah.description:
*Deploy:*
*Stun* and *Push 1* all units on an enemy row.
card.heroCarienne.name: Carienne
card.heroCarienne.title: The Storm Unleashed
card.heroCarienne.description:
*Deploy:*
Deal {damagePerWave} Damage to all enemy units.
Repeat once for every *Storm* card in your Graveyard.
card.heroUrvial.name: Urvial
card.heroUrvial.title: The Stormsmith
card.heroUrvial.description:
*Deploy:* Your *Storms* are upgraded until the end of the game.

Upgraded *Storms* may target the same unit multiple times.
card.heroGarellion.name: Garellion
card.heroGarellion.title: The Conduit
card.heroGarellion.description:
*Round end*:
*Infuse All* to gain {powerPerMana} Power per Mana *Infused*.
card.heroAura.name: Aura
card.heroAura.title: The Golden Hawk
card.heroAura.description:
*Deploy:*
*Play* a Legendary card from your deck.
card.heroArgenta.name: Argenta
card.heroArgenta.title: The Silver Falcon
card.heroArgenta.description:
*Deploy:*
*Play* an Epic card from your deck.
card.heroAntoria.name: Antoria
card.heroAntoria.title: The Martyr
card.heroAntoria.description:
Whenever an ally takes damage while {name} is in your hand, redirect the damage to her.

If {name} is killed while in your hand, *Draw* a card.
card.heroTroviar.name: Troviar
card.heroTroviar.title: The Torturer
card.heroTroviar.description:
Whenever another unit takes damage, *Heal* {powerRestored} to self.

*Deploy:* Deal {selfDamage} Damage to self.
card.heroMetrearte.name: Metrearte
card.heroMetrearte.title: The Copycat
card.heroMetrearte.description:
*Deploy:*
Choose a Leader Power from any Arcane Leader.
Gain a copy of it.
card.heroMetrearte.flavor:
I'll become what you like
This is what you wanted, right?
card.heroPozoga.name: Pożoga
card.heroPozoga.title: The Arsonist
card.heroPozoga.description:
*Deploy:*
Destroy all cards with the highest Power on the board.
card.heroLearthe.name: Learthe
card.heroLearthe.title: The Death Speaker
card.heroLearthe.description:
*Deploy:*
Choose a row.
Fill it with *Harmless Shadows*.
card.heroJom.name: Jom
card.heroJom.title: Acolyte of the Void
card.heroJom.description:
*Deploy:* *Create* a *Void portal*.

*Turn End:* If you control at least {portalsNeeded} *Void portals*, destroy them and *Create* an *Abyss Portal*.
card.heroJom.flavor: He has ascended way beyond the elements.
card.heroSparklingSpirit.name: Sparkling Spirit
card.heroStormDancer.name: Storm Dancer
card.heroStormDancer.description:
Whenever you cast a spell, give +{powerGiven} Power to adjacent units.
If it's a *Storm*, give them +{stormPowerGiven} Power instead.
card.heroCoralScribe.name: Coral Scribe
card.heroCoralScribe.description:
*Deploy:*
For each different *Storm* in your Graveyard, *Create* a copy of it.
card.heroFlameDancer.name: Flame Dancer
card.heroRavenCaller.name: Raven Caller
card.heroLightOracle.name: Oracle of Light
card.heroLightOracle.description:
*Deploy:*
Look at top {cardsToSee} cards from your deck (in order).
Choose one to *Play*.
card.unitCultistBrute.name: Cultist Brute
card.unitCultistBrute.description:
*Deploy:*
Destroy an allied unit.
Then, gain +{bonusPower} Power.
card.unitCultistSpellslinger.name: Cultist Spellslinger
card.unitCultistSpellslinger.description:
*Deploy:*
Destroy an allied unit
to *Create* a *Scroll*.
It costs 1 Mana less for every Power the target unit had.
card.heroCultistOfAreddon.name: Cultist of Areddon
card.heroCultistOfAreddon.description:
*Deploy:*
Destroy an allied non-cultist unit.
Then, *Create* a copy of it.
card.heroAdventuringGuildMaster.name:
Adventuring
Guild Master
card.heroAdventuringGuildMaster.descript:
*Deploy:*
Gain +{powerPerCard} Power per other Unit played this turn.
card.heroTribeShaman.name: Tribal Shaman
card.heroElderElemental.name: Elder Elemental
card.heroElderElemental.description:
*Deploy:* Generate {manaGenerated} Mana.

*Turn start:* Repeat this unit's *Deploy* effect
card.unitDarkTimewarper.name: Dark Timewarper
card.unitDarkTimewarper.description:
*Deploy:*
Trigger a *Turn end* effect on all allied *Void Portals*.
Then, *Create* a *Void Portal*.
card.unitTravelingEnchantress.name:
Traveling
Enchantress
card.unitTravelingEnchantress.descriptio:
*Deploy:*
Give +{baseStrengthGiven} Power to an allied unit.
Then, if their current Power is at least 11, give +{extraStrengthGiven} Power more.
card.unitRavenMessenger.name: Raven Messenger
card.unitRavenMessenger.description:
*Deploy:*
*Play* a Bronze Soldier card from your deck.
card.unitChargingKnight.name: Charging Steed
card.unitChargingKnight.description:
*Order:* Deal {damage} Damage to an enemy unit.

May only attack after moving forward on the same turn.
card.unitChargingKnight.flavor: The card that has been reworked way too many times.
card.unitPriestessOfAedine.name: Priestess of Aedine
card.unitSupplyWagon.name: Supply Wagon
card.unitSupplyWagon.description:
*Deploy:*
Give +{extraPower} Power to adjacent units
Then, *Move* them {pushDistance} row forward
card.unitStoneElemental.name: Stone Elemental
card.unitStoneElemental.description:
*Deploy:*
Deal {damage} Damage to an enemy unit.
Apply *Stun* for 1 turn.
card.unitEagleEyeArcher.name: Eagle Eye Archer
card.unitEagleEyeArcher.description:
*Deploy:*
Deal {damage} Damage to an enemy unit.
card.unitMerfolkStormcaller.name: Merfolk Stormcaller
card.unitMerfolkEnchantress.name: Merfolk Enchantress
card.unitCrystalMiner.name: Crystal Miner
card.unitLoneLooter.name: Lone Looter
card.unitLoneLooter.description: Whenever you apply a *Status effect* to an enemy unit, *Play* one {name} from your deck.
card.unitMasterSwordsmith.name: Master Swordsmith
card.unitMasterSwordsmith.description:
*Deploy:*
Give +{bonusPower} Power to all unit cards in your hand.
card.unitVolatileCrystal.name: Volatile Crystal
card.unitVolatileCrystal.description:
*Deathrattle:*
Deal {damage} Damage to adjacent units on the same row.
card.unitUndercityGambler.name: Undercity Gambler
card.unitUndercityGambler.description:
*Deploy:* Choose a non-temporary card in your unit hand to return into your deck.

*Draw* a card and give it +{bonusPower} Power.
card.unitOceanicSeagull.name: Oceanic Seagull
card.unitOceanicSeagull.description:
*Deploy:*
*Play* a Bronze Merfolk card from your deck.
card.unitMerchantsAssistant.name: Merchants Assistant
card.unitMerchantsAssistant.description:
*Deploy:*
Next spell you cast this round costs {spellDiscount} Mana less.
card.unitMercantileSpellslinger.name: Mercantile Spellslinger
card.unitMercantileSpellslinger.descript:
*Deploy:*
Add a Scroll to your hand.
It costs {manaMarkup} Mana more, but gets {discountPerTurn} Mana cheaper every turn.
card.unitHighClassPerformer.name: High Class Performer
card.unitHighClassPerformer.description:
*Deploy:* Give +{bonusPower} Power to all allied units on other rows.

This card can only be played on a row with at least {cardsRequired} allied units.
card.unitHighClassPerformer.flavor: After the valley of plenty has finally tossed its' last coin, he decided to try his lute in a different genre.
card.unitHungrySpellslinger.name: Hungry Spellslinger
card.unitHungrySpellslinger.description:
*Infuse *{infuseCost}*:*
Add a Scroll to your hand.
It costs {spellDiscount} Mana less.
card.unitElderHoundmaster.name: Elder Houndmaster
card.unitElderHoundmaster.description:
*Deploy:*
Summon two *Trained Hounds* on the front row.
card.unitTrainedHound.name: Trained Hound
card.unitEnergyRelay.name: Energy Relay
card.unitEnergyRelay.description:
On *Turn end*, *Infuse *{infuseCost}*:*
Deal {damageDealt} Damage to
opposing enemy units.
card.unitWoundedVeteran.name: Wounded Veteran
card.unitVoidcaller.name: Voidcaller
card.unitVoidcaller.flavor: Thankfully, this line is always available.
card.unitLivingShadow.name: Living Shadow
card.unitLivingShadow.flavor: The one forgotten by her siblings.
card.unitYoungSquire.name: Young Squire
card.unitTinySparkling.name: Tiny Sparkling
card.unitHelplessPeasants.name: Helpless Peasants
card.unitHelplessPeasants.description:
*Deploy:* *Summon* a copy of itself to the right.

If covered by *Protector* at the end of your turn, gain +{selfBuff} Power.
card.unitHelplessPeasants.flavor: Somebody please, we are getting attacked!.
card.tokenEmptyDeck.name: Cricket
card.tokenPlayerDeck.name: Your deck
card.tokenOpponentDeck.name: Your opponent's deck
card.spellLightningStorm.name: Lightning Storm
card.spellLightningStorm.description:
Deal {damage} Damage to {targetCount} enemy units.Deal {damage} Damage to an enemy unit. Repeat this {targetCount} times.

Number of targets increases by {targetsPerStorm} for every *Storm* card in your Graveyard.
card.spellEnchantedStorm.name: Enchanted Storm
card.spellEnchantedStorm.description:
Give +{buffPower} Power to {targetCount} allied units.Give +{buffPower} Power to an allied unit. Repeat this {targetCount} times.

Bonus Power increases by {powerPerStorm} for every *Storm* card in your Graveyard.
card.spellScrollOfLightning.name: Scroll of Lightning
card.spellScrollOfLightning.description: Deal {damage} Damage to an enemy unit.
card.spellScrollOfGrowth.name: Scroll of Growth
card.spellScrollOfImmunity.name: Scroll of Immunity
card.spellScrollOfImmunity.description: Apply *Immunity* to an allied unit until the start of your next turn.
card.spellScrollOfBlinding.name: Scroll of Blinding
card.spellScrollOfBlinding.description:
Choose an enemy unit.
Apply *Stun* to target and adjacent units for {buffDuration} turns.
card.spellScrollOfSapping.name: Scroll of Sapping
card.spellScrollOfSapping.description:
Choose a unit.
Return it to the owner's hand and grant it *'Temporary card'*.
card.spellSteelSpark.name: Steel Spark
card.spellSteelSpark.description:
Deal {damage} Damage to an enemy unit.

Deal {sideDamage} Damage to adjacent units.
card.spellFleetingSpark.name: Fleeting Spark
card.spellFleetingSpark.description: Deal {damage} Damage to an enemy unit.
card.spellAnEncouragement.name: An Encouragement
card.spellAnEncouragement.description:
Choose an allied unit.
Next turn, it gains {bonusPower} Power.
card.spellFireball.name: Fireball
card.spellFireball.description:
Deal {damage} Damage to an enemy unit.

Deal {areaDamage} Damage to all adjacent units.
card.spellEternalServitude.name: Eternal Servitude
card.spellEternalServitude.description:
Transform an allied unit into a *Leader Power*. This unit now costs Mana equal to it's base Power.

Then, *Destroy* this unit.
card.spellFlamingSpark.name: Flaming Spark
card.spellFlamingSpark.description:
Deal {damage} Damage to an enemy unit.

Deals {damagePerWeave} extra Damage per stack of *Weave*
card.spellFlameweave.name: Flameweave
card.heroQidala.name: Qidala
card.heroQidala.title: The Mistress of Exchange
card.heroQidala.description:
*Deploy:*
*Discard* a unit card from your hand and receive a *Loot* spell of appropriate rarity.
Then, *Draw* a card.
card.heroQidala.flavor: - "The rule of equivalent exchange will I always follow, yet deep in my heart do I know that fortune does indeed favor the bold."
card.heroIllusionTwin.name: Illusion Twin
card.heroIllusionTwin.description:
*Turn end:* Deal {powerLost} Damage to self.

Then, add +{powerGiven} Power to the left-most copy of this card in the owner's hand.
card.unitYogaTeacher.name: Yoga Teacher
card.unitYogaTeacher.description:
*Deploy:*
*Discard* a card from your hand.
Then, add a copy of that card to your hand.
card.unitYogaTeacher.flavor: - "Trust in yoga, train your body and soul, and one day you will awaken a new person."
card.unitSkybornMother.name: Skyborn Mother
card.unitSkybornMother.description: While you hold this in your hand, the last unit you have played has +{powerGiven} Power.
card.unitEndlessArmy.name: Endless Army
card.unitEndlessArmy.description:
*Deploy:*
Add an *Endless Army* to the bottom of your deck.
card.unitAulerianSongwriter.name: Aulerian Songwriter
card.unitAulerianSongwriter.description:
*Deploy:*
Choose a unit.
All copies of this card have +{bonusPower} Power for the rest of the game.
card.leaderChallengeDummy.name: Dummy
card.leaderChallengeDummy.title: The Scapegoat
card.leaderChallengeDummy.description:
*Round start:*
*Summon* a *Target Dummy* on your middle row.
card.heroChallengeDummyWarrior0.name: Oenus
card.heroChallengeDummyWarrior0.title: Dummy of Prudence
card.heroChallengeDummyWarrior1.name: Josclyn
card.heroChallengeDummyWarrior1.title: Dummy of Justice
card.heroChallengeDummyWarrior2.name: Willmot
card.heroChallengeDummyWarrior2.title: Dummy of Fortitude
card.heroChallengeDummyWarrior3.name: Tomkin
card.heroChallengeDummyWarrior3.title: Dummy of Temperance
card.unitChallengeDummyOPWarrior.name: Overcharged Dummy
card.unitChallengeDummyRoyalWarrior.name: Royal Dummy
card.tokenChallengeDummyTargetDummy.name: Target Dummy
card.tokenChallengeDummyTargetDummy.flav: - "We have put all our Mana into our new creation. It is the most powerful Dummy of them all."
card.leaderMaximilian.name: <if inGame><c=black>*{playerName}*</c></if><ifn inGame>The Commander</if>
card.leaderMaximilian.title: <if inGame>The Commander</if>
card.spellQuickStrike.name: Quick Strike
card.spellQuickStrike.description: Deal {damage} Damage to an enemy unit.
card.spellReinforcements.name: Reinforcements
card.spellReinforcements.description:
*Draw* a card.

You can play an extra unit card this turn.
card.heroChallengeLegendaryExplorer0.des:
Choose one of {cardsToExplore} random Legendary cards.
*Create* a copy of it.
card.heroChallengeLegendaryExplorer1.des:
Choose one of {cardsToExplore} random Legendary cards.
*Create* a copy of it.
card.heroChallengeLegendaryExplorer2.des:
Choose one of {cardsToExplore} random Legendary cards.
*Create* a copy of it.
card.heroChallengeLegendaryExplorer3.des:
Choose one of {cardsToExplore} random Legendary cards.
*Create* a copy of it.
card.unitChallengeScarredExplorer.name: Scarred Explorer
card.unitChallengeScarredExplorer.descri:
Choose one of {cardsToExplore} random Epic cards.
*Create* a copy of it.
card.unitChallengeEagerExplorer.name: Eager Explorer
card.unitChallengeEagerExplorer.descript:
Choose one of {cardsToExplore} random Common cards.
*Create* a copy of it.
card.unitArcheryTower.name: Archery Tower
card.unitArcheryTower.description:
*Order:* Deal {damage} Damage to an enemy unit.

May only attack once per adjacent Soldier.
card.unitBloodyTrebuchet.name: Bloody Trebuchet
card.unitBloodyTrebuchet.description:
*Order:* Deal {damage} Damage to an enemy unit and {splashDamage} Damage to units directly behind.

May only attack if adjacent to at least two Soldiers.
card.unitWoodenPalisade.name: Wooden Palisade
card.unitGenerousBlacksmith.name: Generous Blacksmith
card.unitGenerousBlacksmith.description: Whenever a unit moves into adjacent position from another row, give it +{bonusArmor} Armor.
card.unitQuietInfiltrator.name: Quiet Infiltrator
card.unitCropField.name: Crop Field
card.unitCropField.description:
*Turn end:* Give +{bonusPower} Power to an allied unit with lowest Power value.

Repeat once for every adjacent Commoner.
card.heroRobert.name: Robert
card.heroRobert.title: Building Instructor
card.heroRobert.description:
*Deploy:*
*Play* a Building from your deck and *Create* a copy of it.
Both copies have no Armor.
card.heroRobert.flavor: - "And that's how you build it. Easy, right? Now, repeat after me."
card.heroThomas.name: Thomas
card.heroThomas.title: Master Builder
card.unitHastyHandyman.name: Hasty Handyman
card.unitHastyHandyman.description:
*Deploy:*
Restore an allied Building to maximum Armor.
card.unitMagiciansAssistant.name: Magician's Assistant
card.unitMagiciansAssistant.description:
*Deploy:* Put a copy of an enemy unit to the top of your deck.

If your deck has no duplicates, you can also target allied units.
card.unitPrototypeScorpionCrew.name:
Prototype
Scorpion Crew
card.unitPrototypeScorpionCrew.descripti:
*Order:* Deal {targetDamage} Damage to an enemy unit and {selfDamage} Damage to itself.

May perform unlimited number of attacks per turn.
card.unitEldergroveTender.name: Eldergrove Tender
card.unitEldergroveTender.description:
*Deploy:*
Give +{bonusPower} Power and apply *Growth* to an allied unit.
card.unitManaSilo.name: Mana Silo
card.unitManaSilo.description:
*Deploy:* *Infuse* up to {maxInfuse} Mana.

*Round start:* Release the *Infused* Mana.

Mana stored: {manaInfused}.
card.unitFieldHospital.name: Field Hospital
card.unitUrbanAmbusher.name: Urban Ambusher
card.unitUrbanAmbusher.description: Has +{bonusPower} Power for every Building on the same row.
card.unitUrbanTactician.name: Urban Tactician
card.unitUrbanTactician.description: Your units that are directly adjacent to a Building have +{bonusPower} Power.
card.unitMadnessIncarnate.name: Madness Incarnate
card.unitShatteredSpace.name: Shattered Space
card.unitNullMender.name: Null Mender
card.unitNullMender.description:
*Deploy:*
Choose a row with *Shattered Space*. Destroy one copy of it on that row.
card.unitAulerianInquisitor.name: Aulerian Inquisitor
card.unitAulerianInquisitor.description:
*Deploy:*
Destroy an enemy unit that has at least {buffsRequired} buffs.
card.leaderTheScavenger.name: <if inGame><c=black>*{playerName}*</c></if><ifn inGame>The Scavenger</if>
card.leaderTheScavenger.title: <if inGame>The Scavenger</if>
card.leaderTheScavenger.description:
*Neutral Leader*

*Game start:* Add one of each Salvage spells to your Graveyard.

*Round start:* Gain +{manaPerRound} Mana
card.spellPokeTheSalvage.name: Poke The Salvage
card.spellPokeTheSalvage.description: *Play* a Salvage Spell that costs {targetSpellCost} or less from your Graveyard.
card.spellScourTheSalvage.name: Scour The Salvage
card.spellScourTheSalvage.description: *Play* a Spell that costs {targetSpellCost} or less from your Graveyard.
card.spellDiveTheSalvage.name: Dive The Salvage
card.spellDiveTheSalvage.description:
*Play* a Spell that costs {targetSpellCost} or less from your Graveyard.
If it's a Salvage Spell, also *Create* a copy of it.
card.spellBecomeTheSalvage.name: Become The Salvage
card.spellBecomeTheSalvage.description:
*Exile* a Salvage Spell from your Graveyard.
Gain Mana equal to its' cost.
card.spellRustedAxe.name: Rusted Axe
card.spellRustedAxe.description:
Deal {damage} Damage to an enemy unit.

This card costs *1* more this round.
card.spellRustedChalice.name: Rusted Chalice
card.spellRustedChalice.description:
*Heal* {healPower} an allied unit.

This card costs *1* more this round.
card.spellRustedWagon.name: Rusted Wagon
card.spellRustedWagon.description:
*Move* {moveDistance} an allied unit.

This card costs *1* more this round.
card.spellRustedWand.name: Rusted Wand
card.spellRustedWand.description:
*Dispel* {dispelPower} from an enemy unit.

This card costs *1* more this round.
card.spellRustedWhistle.name: Rusted Whistle
card.spellRustedWhistle.description:
*Create* a *Stray Dog*.

This card costs *1* more this round.
card.spellRustedHorn.name: Rusted Horn
card.spellRustedHorn.description:
Give +{extraPower} Power to an allied unit.

This card costs *1* more this round.

card.heroNotEleyas.name: Not Ele'yas
card.heroNotEleyas.title: The Indecisive
card.heroNotEleyas.description: Whenever you draw this unit or return it to your deck, boost self by 3.
card.heroNotEleyas.flavor: If nobody is there to complain, is it copyright infringement?
card.unitEleyasDoppelganger.name: Ele'yas Doppelganger
card.unitEleyasDoppelganger.description: Gets bonus Power equal to original Ele'yas (wherever he is).
card.unitDryadSmuggler.name: Dryad Smuggler
card.unitDryadSmuggler.description:

*Draw* a card from the bottom of your deck.
card.unitCorgiGravedigger.name: Corgi Gravedigger
card.unitCorgiGravedigger.description:
*Deploy:*
Choose a card in your Graveyard to return to your hand.
card.unitCorgiGravedigger.flavor: And he works in the cutest graveyard you'll ever visit!

card.leaderCampfireThePlayer.title: <if inGame>The Player</if>

card.heroCampfireProtagonist.title: Your very own person
card.heroCampfireProtagonist.description: Where are you going to sit tonight?
card.leaderCampfireTheMother.name: The Mother
card.leaderCampfireTheMother.title: An Antagonist
card.leaderCampfireTheMother.description: You can feel its' presence from very, very far away.
card.heroCampfireNira.name: Niraveronienne
card.heroCampfireNira.title: The First Daughter
card.heroCampfireNira.description: Being loud and cheeky as usual, Nira is telling Bodge a fascinating story about twigs and birbs.
card.heroCampfireBodge.name: Bodge
card.heroCampfireBodge.title: The Dark One
card.heroCampfireBodge.description: Being completely preoccupied with cleaning bits of dirt off his axe, Bodge is most affuredly ignoring the dryad chirping into his ear.
card.heroCampfireElsa.name: Elsa
card.heroCampfireElsa.title: The Queen of Ravens
card.heroCampfireElsa.description: The most mysterious of your companions is sitting with her arms crossed. She is calmly looking north, towards the approaching Scourge.
card.unitCampfireBlackChair.name: Black Chair
card.unitCampfireTree.name: Tree
card.unitCampfireFire.name: Campfire
card.unitCampfireFire.description: Brings warmth and feeling of safety at night.

card.unitCampfireEmptySpace.description: Soft and warm ground next to the campfire.

card.unitMerfolkSkygazer.description:

Apply *Healing Rain* to an allied row.

card.unitDryadWolfspeaker.name: Dryad Wolfspeaker
card.unitDryadWolfspeaker.description: While you control at least {beastsRequired} Beasts, increases your *Direct Unit Damage* by {bonusDamage}.

card.unitRoyalTaxCollector.description:

Give all allied Nobles *-*{debuffPotency} Power to add a *Royal Tithe* to your hand for every affected Noble.

Give an allied unit *+*{bonusPower} Power.

You can only play one copy of this card per turn.

card.unitTheMinisterOfLand.title: The Minister of Land
card.unitTheMinisterOfLand.description:
*Play* this from your deck on your back row if you control at least {peasantsRequired} Commoners.

Your Commoners have *-*{weaknessPotency} Power.
